org.apache.flink.core.fs

接口 LimitedConnectionsFileSystem.StreamWithTimeout

  • 所有超级接口:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.io.Closeable
    所有已知实现类:
    LimitedConnectionsFileSystem.InStream, LimitedConnectionsFileSystem.OutStream
    封闭类:
    LimitedConnectionsFileSystem

    private static interface LimitedConnectionsFileSystem.StreamWithTimeout
extends java.io.Closeable
    Interface for streams that can be checked for inactivity.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void closeDueToTimeout()
      Closes the stream asynchronously with a special exception that indicates closing due to lack of progress.
      long getPos()
      Gets the current position in the stream, as in number of bytes read or written.
      LimitedConnectionsFileSystem.StreamProgressTracker getProgressTracker()
      Gets the progress tracker for this stream.
      boolean isClosed()
      Checks whether the stream was closed already.

      • 从接口继承的方法 java.io.Closeable

        close

    • 方法详细资料

      • getProgressTracker

        LimitedConnectionsFileSystem.StreamProgressTracker getProgressTracker()
        Gets the progress tracker for this stream.

     throws java.io.IOException

                throws java.io.IOException
